name: Russian Wide Hero
description: In this rogue-like/lite action game you fight your way through the out-of-control-traffic somewhere in Russia. You play as the Russian Wide Hero, a wide invincible dude who has to save his mother from getting run over by the cars. Get awarded highscores! Beat up cars! Enjoy gorgeous graphics made possible by Unity! Be stunned by the power of the Physics System of the same engine! We have great music, too!
